title: Bug 33777"Tab" key invokes TraverseListener on the Shell
description: Bug 33777"Tab" key invokes TraverseListener on the Shell
OB: 2.1 RC1 motif build.org.eclipse.help.ui.internal.ContextHelpDialog registers TraverseListener withShell.The listener is called when "Tab" key or "ShiftTab" key combination ispressed.It shoud not be invoked for these keys.
SR: 2.1 RC1 motif build.org.eclipse.help.ui.internal.ContextHelpDialog registers TraverseListener withShell.The listener is called when "Tab" key or "ShiftTab" key combination ispressed.It shoud not be invoked for these keys.
